docs.title: Atomic Ledger
docs.text:
Immutable, append-only transaction logging.

Atomic Ledger provides guaranteed atomic writes for financial operations. Every transaction is persisted before returning.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Atomic Writes — All or nothing
  • Append-Only — No modifications
  • Hash Chain — Tamper detection

docs.title: Development Setup
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/vindicta-platform/Atomic-Ledger-Py.git
cd Atomic-Ledger-Py
python -m venv .venv
.venv\Scripts\activate
pip install -e ".[dev]"

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
uv pip install git+https://github.com/vindicta-platform/Atomic-Ledger-Py.git

from atomic_ledger import Ledger

ledger = Ledger()
ledger.append(debit=100, credit=0, memo="Initial deposit")
